summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Dallas City Council is holding a Special Called Joint Meeting of the Ad Hoc Committee on Professional Sports Recruitment and Retention and the Economic Development Committee on March 26, 2024, at 3:30 PM. The meeting aims to discuss initiatives related to professional sports and economic development in Dallas.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. **FIFA World Cup 2026 Update**: A briefing will be provided by Rosa Fleming (Director, Convention & Event Services), Craig Davis (President & CEO, Visit Dallas), and Monica Paul (Executive Director, Visit Dallas - Dallas Sports Commission).
2. **Closed Session Discussion**: The committee will deliberate on commercial and financial information regarding a business prospect referred to as "Project X," which involves potential economic development negotiations and financial incentives.

**Important Details**:  
The meeting will include a closed session to discuss sensitive negotiations that may impact the city's position regarding "Project X." This session will cover the potential lease or use of real property and the offer of financial incentives to attract or retain this business.

**Action Items**:  
The committee seeks to gather insights on the FIFA World Cup preparations and make decisions regarding the financial incentives and negotiations for "Project X." Approval may be required for any proposed financial incentives or agreements resulting from these discussions. 

The meeting will be accessible to the public both in-person and virtually, ensuring transparency in the proceedings.
